issue.title: 4.2.0 Beta 4 Package contains install folders and size doubled
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Problem with the 4.2.0 Beta 4 Joomla package:

In the @easysdi@ folder (that normally contains components, modules and plugins install ZIPs) there's also installation folders for each item (unzipped).
The package has doubled size!

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Yves,

Sorry about that problem, but such package should normally not be uploaded to the forge.
This package was not built with ant and was manually done for some tests, so such problem won't appear in future classical builts.

This issue is rejected.
